scripts.build:dev: source .env && bun build src/main.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --external obsidian --define "DBB_API_BASE_URL='$DBB_API_BASE_URL'"
scripts.build:prod: source .env.prod && bun build src/main.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --external obsidian --define "DBB_API_BASE_URL='$DBB_API_BASE_URL'"
scripts.package: bun run build && mkdir -p "$HOME/Desktop/projects/daily-brain-bits/test dbb/.obsidian/plugins/daily-brain-bits" && cp manifest.json dist/main.js "$HOME/Desktop/projects/daily-brain-bits/test dbb/.obsidian/plugins/daily-brain-bits/"
scripts.deploy: bun run build && mkdir -p "$HOME/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/YOUNES/.obsidian/plugins/daily-brain-bits" && cp manifest.json dist/main.js "$HOME/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/YOUNES/.obsidian/plugins/daily-brain-bits/"
